
timeline.bodyHTML:
Haha, build is failing.

Suggested change
GuideOpenEvent event = new GuideOpenEvent(p, e.getItem(), layout) ;
SlimefunGuideOpenEvent event = new SlimefunGuideOpenEvent(p, e.getItem(), layout);
